Main living area designed for family gatherings; positioned centrally for balanced energy flow according to Vastu.
Entertainment room with integrated audiovisual equipment and comfortable seating. Located in a dedicated space ensuring minimal disturbances from the exterior.
Well-ventilated bathroom placed near the living area for convenience; following Vastu recommendations for water element placement.
